short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension for showing highlights in Google Slides

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A great little Chrome browser extension which allows you to add quick and easy highlights when presenting with Google Slides.

Once you have installed the extension, you can add highlights to the slides you are presenting, as well as being able to download the highlighted slide as a PNG image file - in case you want to share it with your audience / class later!
